attributes.action: Stop Oversea's Aid and deal with our own problems first
attributes.additional_details:
Stop Oversea's Aid. Just consider if we have another bad winter how many will Freeze to Death because of Fuel Poverty,
How many will commit suicide because of Debt,
How many will starve or become homeless because of benifit cuts,
How many will be effected by crime because of policing cuts, the list will go on and on.
The Goverment needs to consider the people of the UK FIRST and not THEIR place in the history books
